parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.22

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Containers

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Vehicle Inventory

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>Returns an array with subarrays contains class names and also names of connected items of all the vehicle's cargo weapons in [[weaponsItems]] format. If weapon has no magazine, an empty array [] is returned instead of magazine info. If the argument is a vehicle with weapons, vehicles cargo is searched, unlike with [[weaponsItems]] command, which will return vehicle's weapons instead. 
* Since Arma 3 v1.95.145811 the returned array always contains secondary muzzle magazine info and consistent with [[getUnitLoadout]] format for weapon items.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[weaponsItemsCargo]] vehicle

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - see [[weaponsItems]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[weaponsItemsCargo]] [[vehicle]] [[player]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[weaponsItemsCargo]] _weaponholder;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[weaponsItems]], [[primaryWeaponItems]], [[secondaryWeaponItems]], [[handgunItems]], [[addPrimaryWeaponItem]], [[addSecondaryWeaponItem]], [[addHandgunItem]], [[primaryWeapon]], [[secondaryWeapon]], [[handgunWeapon]], [[weaponAccessories]], [[weaponAccessoriesCargo]], [[addWeaponWithAttachmentsCargoGlobal]]
</value></part></template>
